name: Auto-Lint Fixer
description: Automatically fixes linting issues on save for source files

condition.script: const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const filePath = process.env.KIRO_FILE_PATH; if (!filePath || !fs.existsSync(filePath)) return false; const content = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'); return content.includes('// TODO') || content.includes('console.log') || content.includes('any;') || content.includes('unused');
